00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_time.h"
00029 #include "kvi_qstring.h"
00030 
00031 //
00032 // This class is used as container for miscelaneous connection state variables
00033 // that do not have a class for their own.
00034 // If you need to add some "minor" variable to the connection state then
00035 // this is the right place for it.
00036 //
00037 
00038 class KVIRC_API KviIrcConnectionStateData
00039 {
00040         friend class KviIrcConnection;
00041         friend class KviServerParser;
00042         friend class KviUserParser;
00043 public:
00044         KviIrcConnectionStateData();
00045         ~KviIrcConnectionStateData();
00046 protected:
00047         bool         m_bSentStartTls;                 // the state of STARTTLS protocol
00048         bool         m_bSentQuit;                     // have we sent the quit message for this connection ?
00049         unsigned int m_uLoginNickIndex;               // the index of the identity nicknames used until now (see KviIrcConnection::loginToIrcServer())
00050         QString      m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect;   // yes.. this is a special command to execute after connection
00051         bool         m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect; // this is set to true if we have to simulate an unexpected disconnect even if we have sent a normal quit message
00052         kvi_time_t   m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply;  // the time that we have received our last channel who reply
00053         kvi_time_t   m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest;    // the time that we have sent our last channel who request
00054         kvi_time_t   m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply;       // the time that we have received the last whois reply, reset to 0 when we receive an /END OF WHOIS
00055 public:
00056         bool sentStartTls(){ return m_bSentStartTls; };
00057         void setSentStartTls(){ m_bSentStartTls = true; };
00058 
00059         bool sentQuit(){ return m_bSentQuit; };
00060         void setSentQuit(){ m_bSentQuit = true; };
00061 
00062         kvi_time_t lastReceivedChannelWhoReply(){ return m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply; };
00063         void setLastReceivedChannelWhoReply(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastReceivedChannelWhoReply = tTime; };
00064 
00065         kvi_time_t lastSentChannelWhoRequest(){ return m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest; };
00066         void setLastSentChannelWhoRequest(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastSentChannelWhoRequest = tTime; };
00067 
00068         kvi_time_t lastReceivedWhoisReply(){ return m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply; };
00069         void setLastReceivedWhoisReply(kvi_time_t tTime){ m_tLastReceivedWhoisReply = tTime; };
00070 
00071         bool simulateUnexpectedDisconnect(){ return m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect; };
00072         void setSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect(){ m_bSimulateUnexpectedDisconnect = true; };
00073 
00074         unsigned int loginNickIndex(){ return m_uLoginNickIndex; };
00075         void setLoginNickIndex(unsigned int uNickIdx){ m_uLoginNickIndex = uNickIdx; };
00076 
00077         const QString & commandToExecAfterConnect(){ return m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect; };
00078         void setCommandToExecAfterConnect(const QString &szCmd){ m_szCommandToExecAfterConnect = szCmd; };
00079 };
00080 
00081 #endif
